response_requirements.initial_response_description: Respond within 15 business days unless written justification provided for longer period (acknowledgment within 5 business days)
response_requirements.final_response_notes: Respond within 15 business days unless written justification provided for longer period
response_requirements.extension_notes: Extensions permitted with written justification for longer response period
response_requirements.good_faith_standard: Respond as soon as practicable and without unreasonable delay

fee_structure.search_fee: May charge actual costs if reasonable
fee_structure.search_fee_notes: Fees reasonably calculated to reimburse actual cost of making records available
fee_structure.copy_fee_notes: Actual cost of making copies; no specific per-page rate in statute
fee_structure.fee_waiver_notes: May provide copies without charge or at reduced fee if in public interest
fee_structure.reasonableness_standard: Fees reasonably calculated to reimburse actual costs; may require advance payment

exemptions.description: Information of personal nature if disclosure would constitute unreasonable invasion of privacy, unless public interest requires disclosure
Information submitted in confidence when disclosure would prejudice government position or impair ability to obtain information
Records concerning ongoing investigations, prosecutions, or criminal complaints
Trade secrets with independent economic value not generally known, subject to reasonable secrecy efforts, with written exemption request
Records specifically exempt from public inspection by court order
Records prohibited or restricted from disclosure under Oregon law

appeal_process.first_level: District Attorney or Attorney General review
appeal_process.first_level_notes: May petition District Attorney or Attorney General to review denial
appeal_process.second_level_deadline_notes: No specific deadline specified in statute
appeal_process.attorney_fees_notes: Reasonable attorney fees awarded if court determines unlawful refusal

requester_requirements.purpose_notes: Request must contain requester's name and address but no purpose statement required
requester_requirements.request_format_notes: Written request required with name, address, and description of records
requester_requirements.specific_format: Written request with name, mailing/email address, and record description

agency_obligations.business_hours_notes: Records open to inspection by any person
agency_obligations.electronic_submission_notes: May request records via email address
agency_obligations.response_format_options: Public body may provide copies in database format if reasonably described
agency_obligations.redaction_requirements: Must describe what portion is available and what is exempt with specific legal basis
agency_obligations.liberal_interpretation: Strong presumption of disclosure - every person has right to inspect except as expressly provided

oversight_body.name: District Attorney or Attorney General
oversight_body.role: Reviews denials and may order disclosure or petition court for injunctive relief

validation_metadata.verification_notes: All fields verified from official Oregon statutes. Response time: acknowledge within 5 business days, respond within 15 business days unless justified extension. Written request required with name and address. Fees based on actual costs, may be waived if in public interest. Written estimate required if fees exceed $25. District Attorney or Attorney General review available, with court enforcement and attorney fees for unlawful denials.
unique_characteristics: 15 business day response deadline with justified extensions
Written request required with specific elements
Fee waiver available if in public interest
Written estimate required if fees exceed $25
DA or AG review process before court action
